title: Evaluate tokenizer efficiency vs Llama/GPT-4 tokenizer on C++ benchmark files
Source Code Acquisition Scripts
description: Download scripts for all C/C++ sources. See docs/design/02-data-pipeline.md

title: Train BPE on 10GB normalized C++ corpus (32K vocab)
Compiler & Debugger Integration (Design Doc 09)
description: Epic covering all work from docs/design/09-compiler-debugger-integration.md: structured compiler diagnostics, platform context headers, DAP debugger integration, thinking tokens, error classification, and sanitizer parsing. Phases 1-5 of the roadmap.

title: F1: Structured Compiler Diagnostics Enhancement
description: Phase 1: Enhance existing DiagnosticParser with clang -fdiagnostics-format=json, improve gcc regex, generate training pairs from diff_sft.jsonl. Format all diagnostics as C++ struct literals in <COMPILE_START>/<COMPILE_END> tags.

title: F2: Platform Context Headers
description: Phase 2: Auto-detect platform info from CMakeLists.txt/meson.build/configure.ac in training corpus. Prepend C++ comment block with compiler, standard, arch, features, libs to every training document. No model changes needed.

title: F3: DAP Debugger Integration
description: Phase 3: Implement DebugSession wrapping DAP client (lldb-dap/gdb-dap). 7 new tool functions: breakpoint, continue_exec, step, inspect, eval, backtrace_get, read_memory. Format debugger output as C++ struct literals. Wire DEBUG_CONTEXT token in engine.py. Generate synthetic debugging traces for SFT.

title: F4: Error Classification & Thinking Tokens
description: Phase 4: Implement error taxonomy (syntax, type_mismatch, undefined_symbol, linker, lifetime, concurrency, logic, platform, resource, ub). Add THINK_ERROR/THINK_FIX/THINK_TRACE/THINK_PLAN/THINK_VERIFY tokens to tokenizer and engine. Integrate error classification into RLVR reward. Generate classified SFT training data.

title: Implement FIM augmentation in data pipeline (50% rate)
Add clang-format post-processor for decode
close_reason: Added decode_formatted() method + format_cpp() standalone function in cpp_tokenizer.py

title: Download Linux Kernel sources by version (v6.0, v6.6, v6.10)
Implement SHA-256 exact-match deduplication
Implement C++ normalizer (strip indentation, preserve newlines)
Build data mix sampler (60% GitHub, 20% textbooks, 10% exercises, 10% Q&A)
Regenerate tool_call_sft to hit planned strategy mix targets
Integrate CppTokenizer into nanochat/tokenizer.py
description: Add CppTokenizer class implementing same interface as RustBPETokenizer: encode, decode, encode_ordinary_batch, vocab_size, bos/eos token IDs.
close_reason: CppTokenizer integrated into nanochat pipeline with env var toggle

title: Build FAISS index for codebase vectors (IVF+PQ, d=2560)
Download The Stack v2 C/C++ subset via HuggingFace
Pretraining Pipeline (NTP+FIM on C++ corpus)
description: Adapt base_train.py for C++ data, add FIM objective (50/50), context curriculum, 3B optimizer config, C++ eval metrics. See docs/design/04-training-pipeline.md

title: Download CommitPack C++ subset for git diff training data
description: Download bigcode/commitpack and commitpackft C++ subsets from HuggingFace. CommitPack has 4TB of git commit+diff pairs across languages. CommitPackFT is the filtered 2GB version. These provide training data for understanding git diffs and merge requests. See docs/design/01-tokenizer.md for diff token support.

title: Build SFT dataset generator (inject bugs, generate debug traces, write reasoning+fix)
close_reason: Built generate_tool_sft.py with 5 strategies (A-E): docstring_search, diff_compile, humaneval_ask, no_tool, run_code. Generated 180k examples.

title: Data Pipeline: C/C++ Source Acquisition, Dedup & Normalization
description: Epic covering all data pipeline work: downloading C/C++ sources (Linux Kernel, LLVM, GCC, Boost, CUDA, The Stack v2), deduplication (MinHash/LSH), normalization (strip indentation), filtering (quality, PII, license headers), FIM augmentation, and binary packaging. Design doc: docs/design/02-data-pipeline.md

title: Implement context injection and generation resumption loop
Download LLVM/Clang sources by release (17.x-19.x)
Tool SFT: stream dataset instead of eager in-memory tokenization
Update GPTConfig for 3B params (hidden=2560, layers=32, heads=32, kv_heads=8, intermediate=6912)
Normalize C++ data (strip indentation, filter)
description: Apply bigcode-dataset quality filters + custom normalizer (strip leading whitespace, compress blank lines, strip license headers). Use DataTrove pipeline framework. Script: scripts/data/normalize_cpp.py
close_reason: Normalize script extracts 149K files, 1.37GB clean text from raw repos

title: Implement SFT training loop with input masking (loss only on output tokens)
close_reason: Implemented tool_sft_dataset.py with auto-masking from token IDs, sft_train.py supports both instruction and tool datasets

title: Binary Data Packaging for Training
description: Pre-tokenize to .bin/.idx format, FIM augmentation, data mix sampling (60/20/10/10), validation split. Compatible with nanochat binary_distributed_data_loader. See docs/design/02-data-pipeline.md

title: MoE Variant (10-12B/2B active, optional)
description: Mixture of Experts: 16 fine-grained experts, 2 shared + K routed (DeepSeek-style), Top-K routing with load balancing loss. See docs/design/03-model-architecture.md

title: Implement Expert Parallelism for multi-GPU training
Add context length curriculum scheduler (8K -> 32K -> 128K progression)
Add context length warmup schedule (4K->8K progression)
Build tool dispatcher (definition, signature, trace, memory, file, compile_check, search)
close_reason: tool_runtime.py implements search/ask/read_file/compile/test/run tools with C++ function call parsing

title: Build test execution reward function (run unit tests, score pass rate)
Build pre-tokenization pipeline (text to binary .bin/.idx format)
Add multi-file C++ evaluation metrics
Download STL implementations (libstdc++, libc++)
Design next-gen 48K/64K C++ tokenizer with morpheme-aware BPE
close_reason: Wrote comprehensive TOKENIZER_V2_PROPOSAL.md with 48K/64K designs including thinking tokens, ChaiScript/Ch, morpheme-aware BPE, number patterns, and phoneme handling

title: Configure Muon+AdamW optimizers for 3B model scale
Run tool-call SFT training on 400M model
description: Train d16_400M_fim_cce_10b on data/tool_call_sft.jsonl (180k examples). Config: 2 epochs, lr=1e-4, max_seq_len=16384, CCE kernel, torch.compile.
close_reason: SFT training complete: 1 epoch, 22606 steps, avg loss 0.697. C++ eval: 22.4% compile rate, 3.5% pass rate.

title: Train depth=12 C++ model on GB10 (M0 validation)
description: Run base_train.py with depth=12, vocab_size=32000, on C++ binary data. Single GPU on GB10. Monitor loss, tok/sec, memory. ~5000 iterations.
close_reason: depth=12 trained 500 steps, val_bpb=3.70, 44K tok/s on GB10

title: Add special tokens (CODE_START/END, THOUGHT_START/END, QUERY_TOOL, INDEX, FIM_PREFIX/MIDDLE/SUFFIX)
close_reason: Added TOOL_RESULT token (ID 19), encode_special mappings for all tool tokens in cpp_tokenizer.py

title: Implement tool token detection and generation stop in inference engine
close_reason: Engine.py modified with QUERY_TOOL accumulation, tool_runtime dispatch, TOOL_RESULT injection as forced tokens

title: Implement MinHash/LSH near-deduplication (Jaccard threshold 0.7)
M0: Proof of Concept — Full Pipeline on GB10 (125M, local)
description: Complete end-to-end cycle at smallest scale: download Nemotron+Stack C++ data, train C++ BPE tokenizer (32K), pre-tokenize with FIM, train depth=12 model on GB10, evaluate tokenizer efficiency + loss + sample completions. Cost: $0. See docs/design/07-stepping-stones.md

title: Implement YaRN RoPE scaling in nanochat/gpt.py
Add token healing for FIM inference
Add shared experts (2 always-active, DeepSeek-style)
Implement quality filters (file size, line length, entropy, unique lines ratio)
Custom C++ BPE Tokenizer
description: Hybrid C++ tokenizer: fixed vocab (C++ keywords, operators, STL names, numbers 0-999, diff markers) + learned BPE + BERT-style whitespace (spaces are delimiters, not tokens). 32,768 total vocab. See docs/design/01-tokenizer.md (v2)

title: Fix tool-SFT runtime and training safety regressions
Latent Code Indexing (CLaRa-style Embedding + FAISS)
description: Use model hidden states at INDEX token as embeddings. FAISS vector DB for codebase. Contrastive fine-tuning (InfoNCE). See docs/design/05-agent-integration.md

title: Download CUDA toolkit sources and headers (12.x)
Add FIM objective (50% NTP / 50% FIM switching)
Implement Top-K expert routing with load balancing auxiliary loss
Long Context Support (YaRN + Context Curriculum)
description: Implement YaRN RoPE scaling for context extension 8K->128K->1M. Add context length curriculum scheduler for LCFT. See docs/design/06-long-context.md

title: Train C++ BPE tokenizer (32K vocab)
description: Hybrid tokenizer: fixed C++ vocab (keywords, operators, STL names, numbers 0-999) + learned BPE + BERT-style whitespace. 32K total vocab. Fixed IDs 0-1599, learned BPE 1600-32767. Use HuggingFace tokenizers library with WhitespaceSplit pre-tokenizer. Script: scripts/tok_train_cpp.py. See docs/design/01-tokenizer.md (v2)
close_reason: Trained 32K hybrid tokenizer: 1600 fixed + 31168 BPE. All 33 fixed ID checks pass, 8/8 encoding tests pass.

title: Implement INDEX token embedding extraction from model hidden states
M3: Full 3B on 8xB200 (200h)
description: Production 3B model. 300B tokens, full SFT+RLVR pipeline, YaRN long context. See docs/design/07-stepping-stones.md

title: Add special token handling in forward pass (stop tokens, tool detection)
SFT: Reasoning Fine-Tuning (Debug State -> Fix)
description: Teach model to generate REASONING blocks. Format: [Debug State + Code] -> [REASONING] -> [Fixed Code]. Synthetic data generation. See docs/design/04-training-pipeline.md

title: Implement PII redactor (emails, IPs, API keys)
Implement GRPO algorithm (Group Relative Policy Optimization)
M2: Quality Scale — 700M-2B on 8xH100 ($300-1000)
description: All data sources, synthetic textbooks, basic SFT with bug-fix pairs. Reasoning tokens. 40-60B unique tokens. See docs/design/07-stepping-stones.md

title: M4: Agent Integration + Codebase Indexing
description: Tool use, ReAct loop, CLaRa-style latent indexing, contrastive fine-tuning, FAISS. See docs/design/07-stepping-stones.md

title: M1: Speedrun Scale — 313M on 8xH100 ($100, 4h)
description: Full data pipeline at medium scale. depth=20 model, 6B tokens, FIM+NTP. Evaluate compilation rate, BPB, FIM quality. Proves C++ specialist approach works at scale. See docs/design/07-stepping-stones.md

title: TPU: align untracked TPU pipeline scripts with shared XLA runtime helpers
Download Nemotron-Pretraining-Code-v1 C++ subset
description: Use HF_TOKEN env var to download nvidia/Nemotron-Pretraining-Code-v1, filter for C/C++ content. Stream via datasets API. Target: 5-10GB. Script: scripts/data/download_cpp_data.py
close_reason: Downloaded LLVM, Boost, Linux kernel, fmt, googletest, abseil, folly, grpc (159K C++ files, 5.1GB raw)

title: Build dedup pipeline with statistics and progress reporting
Implement reward shaping and KL penalty for policy stability
Initial setup complete
description: Beads and Jira integration configured for nanochat project

title: C++ Native BPE Tokenizer
description: Custom BPE tokenizer trained exclusively on C/C++ code. 32K vocab, C++ operator-aware pre-tokenization regex, special tokens (CODE, THOUGHT, QUERY_TOOL, FIM, INDEX), hex address handling. Design doc: docs/design/01-tokenizer.md

title: Evaluate M0: tokenizer efficiency + loss + sample completions
description: Compare our C++ BPE vs tiktoken tokens/byte on C++ files. Check BPB convergence. Sample completions and manually verify they are valid C++. Report results.

title: Add C++ evaluation metrics (compilation rate, FIM accuracy)
Fix BPE token boundary artifacts in CppTokenizer.decode()
description: Fixed CppTokenizer.decode() heuristics that caused split tokens like 'size_t ype', 'is _ prime', 'push _ back'. Root cause: _is_bpe_suffix() was too aggressive and decode() lacked underscore-identifier tracking and BPE suffix continuation state. Added context-aware suffix detection, in_underscore_id tracking, prev_short_suffix continuation, template/pointer handling, and expanded _COMMON_SHORT_WORDS.
close_reason: Implemented and tested: 15/15 test cases pass including size_type, is_prime, push_back, find_first_of, checkpoint, endpoint, vector<int>, char*, int&, and natural language separation.

title: Download GCC sources by version (13.x-14.x)
Download Boost sources by version (1.84-1.86)
Build offline indexing pipeline (Dreaming phase: index all functions)
Pre-tokenize C++ corpus to binary format with FIM
description: Convert normalized C++ text to nanochat binary .bin/.idx format. Apply FIM augmentation (50% rate). Script: scripts/pretokenize_cpp.py

title: Update vocab_size to 32000 and add special token ID constants
Agent Integration: Tool Use & Latent Code Indexing
description: ReAct agent loop with tool tokens (__AGENT_QUERY__), CLaRa-style latent code indexing using model hidden states, contrastive fine-tuning (InfoNCE), FAISS vector DB for codebase search. Design doc: docs/design/05-agent-integration.md

title: Design and implement optional Engram+mHC integration for CPP training
description: Create detailed design doc and implement optional Engram/mHC integration with runtime toggles for baseline, mhc-only, engram-only, and combined modes; add tests, validate, and land in two pushed commits (design then implementation).

title: Adapt nanochat GPT for 3B C++ Specialist
description: Update GPTConfig for 3B (d=2560, L=32, H=32, KV=8), update vocab_size, add special token handling, implement FIM objective. See docs/design/03-model-architecture.md

title: Generate 5M+ synthetic training pairs using teacher model (Claude/GPT-4)
Agent Tool Use & Active Inference Loop
description: ReAct agent loop: detect __AGENT_QUERY__ tokens, dispatch to tools (clangd, GDB, file lookup), inject results, resume generation. See docs/design/05-agent-integration.md

title: Integrate CppTokenizer with nanochat/tokenizer.py interface (encode, decode, encode_ordinary_batch)
Model Architecture: 3B Dense + MoE Variant
description: Adapt nanochat GPT architecture for 3B C++ specialist. Llama-style decoder-only with GQA, SwiGLU, RMSNorm, RoPE theta=1M. Optional MoE variant (10-12B/2B active). YaRN for long context. Design docs: docs/design/03-model-architecture.md, docs/design/06-long-context.md

title: Build compiler reward function (g++ -fsyntax-only check)
Implement FIM training objective (data-level, PSM token ordering)
Code Normalization and Quality Filtering
description: Strip indentation, preserve newlines, compress blank lines, filter by quality heuristics, strip licenses, detect auto-generated code, redact PII. See docs/design/02-data-pipeline.md

title: Fix multi-chip TPU (v5e/v6e) training scripts; ensure GB10 + H100 paths unaffected
description: Review TPU (torch_xla/PJRT) training entrypoints for multi-device per host. Align with recommended xmp.spawn/xm.mark_step/xm.all_reduce patterns. Add device-count detection fallback so v5e/v6e use all local cores even if metadata env missing. Ensure changes don't affect GB10 (SM121) and multi-GPU H100 torchrun/DDP flows; run unit tests + CPU smoke run.

title: Implement auto-generated code detector (DO NOT EDIT markers)
Implement contrastive fine-tuning with InfoNCE loss
Generate train/validation split (99/1)
Download bigcode/the-stack-dedup C++ subset (sample)
description: Download bigcode/the-stack-dedup data_dir=data/c++ (small sample for M0). Script: scripts/data/download_cpp_data.py
close_reason: Used direct git clones instead of HF streaming (gated datasets). 8 repos cloned.

title: Implement license header detection and stripping
Training Pipeline: Pretrain → SFT → RLVR
description: Full training pipeline: Stage 1 Pretraining (NTP+FIM, 200h 8xB200), Stage 2 SFT (reasoning fine-tuning with debug state), Stage 3 RLVR (GRPO with compiler as reward model). Design doc: docs/design/04-training-pipeline.md

title: Code Deduplication Pipeline
description: MinHash/LSH near-dedup + exact SHA-256 dedup. Target: reduce 500GB raw to 150-200GB unique. See docs/design/02-data-pipeline.md

title: TPU: enable multi-chip for SFT/GSPO stages
description: Base pretraining (scripts/base_train.py) now handles PJRT multi-chip safely. Follow-up: scripts/sft_train.py and scripts/gspo_train.py run single-process on TPU when invoked directly (e.g., scripts/run_tpu_training.sh). Refactor to a per-process train() entrypoint + torch_xla launch/spawn, shard datasets/prompts by rank, and ensure checkpointing/eval only on rank0.

title: Design C++ pre-tokenization regex (operators ::, ->, &&, ||, hex literals, identifiers)
RLVR: Reinforcement Learning with Compiler Rewards
description: GRPO algorithm with g++ compiler as reward model. Rewards: compile success (+1), test pass (+5), compile error (-1). See docs/design/04-training-pipeline.md

title: Build online retrieval integration in agent loop
Adapt base_train.py for C++ binary data pipeline
